# Getting Started

# install and launching packages

The code chunk below uses p_load() of pacman package

```{r}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse)
```

Importing the data

```{r}
exam_data <- read_csv("data/Exam_data.csv")
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
ggplot(data = exam_data,
       aes(x = RACE)) +
  geom_bar()
```
